name: Duality Dimension (BmeisterCD)
description:
A third-person shooter, boss rush style game built around a polarity mechanic. Every object in the game has a light or dark element; light ignores light, dark ignores dark. You must carefully manage your own polarity to avoid incoming damage while shifting to the opposite element to destroy your targets.

Duality Dimension was made by a team of four with a unique restriction. We came up with a core mechanic for the game, and each team member created a boss fight built around that mechanic.
